alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 1:42PM CDT until June 10 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Clarke County in east central Mississippi... Southern Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 141 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Duffee to near Meehan to near Rose Hill, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Meehan around 145 PM CDT. Orange around 150 PM CDT. Savoy and Barnett around 155 PM CDT. Nellieburg around 200 PM CDT. Meridian, Stonewall and Sable around 205 PM CDT. Zero around 210 PM CDT. Quitman, Marion, Middleton and De Soto around 215 PM CDT. Increase around 220 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Pachuta and Shubuta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
